name: Fruit Machine (itch)
description:
Fruit Machine v.1.0 - 

It's a classic arcade game from the

play halls. Collect Fruits by

turning the wheel. It's about fruits

and money. Push the ladder or go to

Cashbash mode. Best the highscore.

Good graphics and a lot fun for 59EUR Runs on different Systems in your

Browser. This program is Shareware.
